numbered_ace_sentences: 1. More young women than young men contact their parents weekly.
2. This is true for all kinds of contact.
3. The difference is greater for texting.
4. The difference is greater for phone calls.
5. The difference is smaller for in-person visits.
6. The difference for in-person visits is smaller by 5 percentage points.
7. Texting is the most common way of communication for young women.
8. Texting is the most common way of communication for young men.
9. I wonder why women contact their parents more than men.
10. I wonder why the difference for in-person visits is not as big as the difference for other kinds of contact.
11. Many college students are my friends.
12. I aim to be a college student next year.
13. Many college students live apart from their parents.
14. Many college students contact their parents mainly by texting.
15. Many college students contact their parents mainly by calling.
16. It is complicated to find time to go back home.
17. If home is in a different state, then it is complicated to go back home.
18. The headline is: Did technology change our relationships?
